name: ARK BOX Unlimited
description: Create, share and download unlimited new Stages for this new arcade remix with integrated Stage editor!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or newer Graphics: Direct X compatible Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i Graphics: Geforce or Radeon Gen. 6+ DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 1 GB available space
